comment.author: 53171949@N05
comment._content: Does anyone have any contact info for Eunice?  Her husband Daniel was a cousin to my grandmother and I had opportunity to visit her when I was in Argentina in 2012 and would love to contact her again if possible, but I don't have contact info for her.  Please e-mail hunsberm@gmail.com if you have any info.  Thanks!  Matthew Hunsberger

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your note.  We'll pass it along to the Mennonite Mission Network, which should have contact information for Eunice Miller. I'll ask MMN to copy your message in its entirety to her so she will be able to make contact with you.

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Matthew,  I'm sorry to report that MMN does not have current contact information for Eunice.  I hope that she or someone who knows her will somehow get your contact information to her.
